thisIsNot: This is not the Companies House personal code for the person you have verified.
emailConfirmation: We have sent a confirmation email to
toLet: to let them know you've verified their identity. Their Companies House personal code is included in the email. This may be needed to make a filing with Companies House for this person.
name: Name
optionUsed: Option used to check identity documents
toTheStandard: to the standard set by Companies House and is satisfied that the required personal information is true. The verification checks were completed.
option1Confirmation: Option 1 - The identity documents were checked using identity document validation technology (IDVT).
option2Confirmation: Option 2 - The identity documents were checked by a person.
printFromBrowser: To print this page, select print from your browser menu.
